text: "Run to You" is a 1984 song by Canadian rock singer Bryan Adams and is the leading single from his fourth studio album Reckless. It went to number 4 in Canada, number 6 in the United States, number 8 in Ireland, number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 14 in the Netherlands and New Zealand, number 19 in Belgium and number 24 in Australia. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Bryan Adams songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heartland rock songs
title: Run to You (Bryan Adams song)
